title.@value: Hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type IV

definition.@value: Hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy, type 4 (HSAN4) is an inherited disorder characterised by anhidrosis, insensitivity to pain, self-mutilating behaviour and episodes of fever.

label.@value: Hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type IV
Congenital insensitivity to pain with anhidrosis
HSAN4 - [Hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type 4]
